sentences.sContent: Couple Mikey and Tanya Carr-Hartley have a 56.56-hectare estate in the shadow of Mount Kilimanjaro.
sentences.sCn: 麦基和坦雅夫妇在乞力马扎罗山脚下拥有一个占地56.56公顷的庄园。

sentences.sContent: The ice atop Mount Kilimanjaro in Tanzania has continued to retreat rapidly, declining 26 percent since 2000, scientists say in a new report.
sentences.sCn: 科学家在一份最新报告中称，2000年到现在，坦桑尼亚乞力马扎罗山顶的冰层已经持续快速消退了26%。

sentences.sContent: Q: So you don’t have to do an extraordinary thing like climb Mount Kilimanjaro?
sentences.sCn: 问：这么说你也不必去做一些特别与众不同的事，像攀登乞力马扎罗山之类？

trans.tranCn: 乞力马扎罗山（位于坦桑尼亚；非洲最高山）
